snippet.title: Sangvori Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Sangvori is a multiplayer first-person survival horror that allows up to 12 players to run, hide from, hunt down and chase each other in this asymmetrically balanced round-based game. Sangvori offers a unique blend of cooperative and versus gameplay that has you going from Amnesia esc avoidance and survival, to intense player versus player combat, in the blink of an eye. Our ‘trust no-one’ approach to design, has allowed us to create a game where every decision has a risk, a reward and a choice. Forcing players to second guess themselves in an environment where second guessing yourself can almost certainly mean death. Our game takes place during the Black Death, one of, if not the most horrific and gruesome time period of history, but one that, until now, has been untouched by games.

Sangvori Game Trailer, showcased at the Poly Building in Falmouth, 2017.
